institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 23 (Support for internal learning group competition)
contents: Article 23 (Support for in-house study group competitions) ① The chairman may hold an in-house study group competition (hereinafter referred to as *competition) to voluntarily spread the learning organization support project., ② The competition is an internal plan of the participating company. The goal is to reward learning groups that achieve results through training and operation, etc., ③ The holding period, holding method, screening criteria, and award method of the competition will be conducted in accordance with the plan of each supporting company, but when proceeding, the head of each affiliated organization will be selected. must report to.
